content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Hello Nesibe Trabelsi, thank you for showing interest in my apartment. I appreciate your time. Let's discuss the rental price. Based on the information you have provided, I am willing to negotiate with you to find a mutually beneficial agreement. I am looking for a rental price that will maximize my gains as a landlord, while also being fair to you as a potential tenant. What rental price are you willing to offer for the 25 square meter apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am willing to offer a rental price of 500 Euros per month. However, I would like to request that you consider a higher price of 550 Euros per month. I believe this is a fair price for the location and size of the apartment. If you are unable to agree to this price, I am willing to consider a rental price of 500 Euros per month.
name: Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Thank you for your offer, Nesibe. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate and find a mutually beneficial agreement. I understand your request for a higher rental price of 550 Euros, but I am not able to agree to that at this time. I am looking for a rental price that will maximize my gains as a landlord, while also being fair to you as a potential tenant. Based on my current needs, I am willing to accept the rental price of 500 Euros per month. I hope we can come to an agreement on this price. Is there anything else you would like to discuss before we finalize the rental agreement?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: No, I understand. Thank you for your understanding. I will accept the rental price of 500 Euros per month. I would like to sign the rental agreement as soon as possible. Can you send me a copy of the agreement for me to review and sign?
name: Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Of course, Nesibe. I am glad we were able to come to an agreement on the rental price. I will prepare the rental agreement for you to review and sign. Once you have signed the agreement, you will be able to move into the apartment. Please let me know if you have any further questions or concerns before signing the agreement.
name: Heinrich Heine
